creator: SunBurn
descriptionHtml:
The new Ghana Education Service G.E.S teaching syllabus and Curriculum for all schools including basic, junior high schools, senior high schools, and others,
To assists, teachers to concentrate on the delivery of content and also assist the learner.

APP FEATURES :
• OFFLINE MATERIALS
• WAEC TIME TABLE
• FORUMS
• DARK MODE READER
• ...MORE

Subjects included in package include:
1. English language
2. Information and Communications technology I
3. Natural / Integrated Science
4. Mathematics
5. Citizenship Education
6. Creative Arts
7. Physical Education
8. Ghanaian Language
9. Religious and Moral Education(R.M.E)
10. I.C.T
11. Creative Arts and more

• Disclaimer : this app is not design by the Ministry of education Ghana or do we have any affiliation with them.
descriptionShort: The new Ghana Education Service GES Curriculum and syllabus

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
● Fixed Crash on android 10
● Allow App to be installed or moved to SD Card (May require new installation)
● Improvements to UI
● Fixed some other Crashes
